entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
